members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Loads resources from file
Active editor mode Resource being loaded (edit or default)
Depending on the editor mode, resources will be overrided using default DNN schema. "Edit" resources will only load selected file. When loading "Default" resources (to be used on the editor as helpers) fallback resource chain will be used in order for the editor to be able to correctly see what is the current default value for the any key. This process depends on the current active editor mode: - System: when editing system base resources on en-US needs to be loaded - Host: base en-US, and base locale especific resource - Portal: base en-US, host override for en-US, base locale especific resource, and host override for locale
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Loads resources from file into the HastTable
Current resources HashTable Resources file Base table updated with new resources
Returned hashtable uses resourcekey as key. Value contains a Pair object where: First=>value to be edited Second=>default value
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Returns the resource file name for a given resource and language
Language Name. Identifies the resource being searched (System, Host, Portal) Localized File Name
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

member.name: M:Dnn.Modules.Languages.LocalizePages.KeepConnectionAlive
member.summary: This Write/Flush is needed periodically to avoid issue in Azure. Azure Load Balancer silently dropping idle connections after 4 minutes. Sending some data from time to time to the client from server side, the Azure Load balancer doesn't kill the TCP connection
